Edges-Dragon Disciple -- Male Human Heroic Dragon Disciple
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d6 Strength: d12 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Obese: -1 Strength Step (worn gear)
Skills (20 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Fighting: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6-1
Athletics: (agi) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d6 Repair: (sma) d4
Boating: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d10 Stealth: (agi) d4
Faith: (spi) d6 Performance: (spi) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Auran; Common
Skill Notes: Ugly: -1 Persuasion
Size: 1 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Pharasma (Neutral)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 8; Edge: 12; Skill: 8
Description Notes: Obese: +1 Size
Features
Edges (9 points): Cleric: 1; Connections: 1; Dragon Disciple II: 1; Dragon Disciple III: 1; Dragon Disciple: 1; New Powers: 1; Power Points: 3 Hindrances: Obese; Ruthless; Shamed; Ugly Human Abilities: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Cleric: Has Arcane Background (Cleric), Domain, Channel Energy, and Vow+ features
Domain: +1 Edge Points (domain)
Dragon Disciple II: Has Wings feature
Dragon Disciple III: May use Dragon Form feature for 5 min (may suffer Fatigue to dbl duration) 2/dy
Dragon Disciple: May use Breath Weapon feature 1/encounter
Connections: May call in favors from an acquaintance or organization
Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt
Vow+: Has strict restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 6 (2) Cover: 2 Toughness: 12 (4) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: Plate Breastplate Shield: Medium Shield Weapons: Halberd (d12+d8 AP 1); Hand Crossbow (2d4 R5"); Javelin (d12+d6 R4"); Unarmed (d12+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Obese: -1 Pace/-1 Run Step/+1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Breath Weapon: 9" cone inflicts 3d6 damage plus energy effects
Dragon Form: Gains Size 3, Strength d12, Vigor d10, Armor 4, Bite and Claw that inflict d12+d8, AP 2, and Resistance to heritage energy
Ruthless: Attacks those opposing personal goal
Wings: Fly Pace 8
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 25
Powers:
Curse: (5 PP Necr) RTouch Target suffers 1 level of Fatigue and an additional level each sunset (Spirit neg) (Epic +5 PP Inflicts 1 level of Fatigue each rd (Spirit neg); incapacity turns to stone)
Healing: (3 PP Conj) RTouch Target recovers from 1 Wound (Raise 2) suffered in the past hr (+10 PP Restores older Wound; +15 PP Heals crippling injury; Epic +2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius heals allies; +1 PP Neutralizes poison or disease)
Mind Wipe: (3 PP Ench) R8" Target forgets up to 30 min (Raise several hour) event (Smarts neg) after 1 min activation (+1 PP Edits memory; +2 PP Activate power as an action; Epic +2 PP Completely removes all memory of a person, place, or thing)
Planar Binding: (8 PP Conj) R8" Summons and traps an extraplanar creature to perform a service (Spirit neg)
Protection: (2 PP Abju) R8" Target gains +2 Armor (Raise +2 Toughness) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Zombie: (3+ PP Necr) R8" Animates and controls corpse for 1 hr or stores PP for permanent (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Target is armed; +1 PP Target has 2 Armor points; +1 PP Self can use target senses; +1 PP Corpse becomes animated skeleton)
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Cleric): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +15 Power Points
Channel Energy: May cast Healing at R8"; additional targets cost 1 Power Point each
